ing: 2 teaspoons strawberry jam, or to taste
1 pinch white sugar, or to taste
des: "This salsa is really very spicy, so be careful! It also tastes wonderful with potato chips or salted pretzels."
ins: Stir together the tomato paste, chili paste, ketchup, hot sauce, jam, sugar, salt, and oregano in a bowl. Chill until ready to serve.
